meanings: [명사] decision, set, resolution, (formal) determination, [동사] decide, (formal) determine, make[come to, arrive at] a decision, make up one's mind; (날짜·장소 등을)fix

vlive.korean: 이게 결정적 힌트예요? Is it the critical clue? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.19
마지막 힌트가 정말 결정적이었나요? Was the last hint a really critical hint? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.19
vlive.english: Was the last hint a really critical hint?

vlive.korean: 제가... - 그리고 전 오늘 하나 결정한 게 있습니다 - 무엇입니까? I... - I've made a decision today. - What's that? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] AB6IX x Rooftop Live - AB6IX의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: I... - I've made a decision today. - What's that?

vlive.korean: 아니 의사가 2명일 수가 없잖아 - 결정에 따르겠습니다 - 아닌가? There can't be 2 doctors. - But I'll follow your decision. - He's not? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] SF9 x 우리의 밤 (Our Night with SF9)
vlive.english: There can't be 2 doctors. - But I'll follow your decision. - He's not?

vlive.korean: 드디어! 결정했어! Finally! We've decided! 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : 꾸며봅시당🖤

examples.korean: We will defer to whatever the committee decides. 발음듣기 우리는 위원회의 결정이 어떻게 나오든 그 결정을 따를 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We will defer to whatever the committee decides. 발음

examples.korean: The factory has been earmarked for closure. 발음듣기 그 공장은 폐쇄가 결정되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The factory has been earmarked for closure. 발음

examples.korean: That decision came back to haunt him. 발음듣기 그 결정은 그에게 계속 문제가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That decision came back to haunt him. 발음

examples.korean: The court will decide our fate/fates. 발음듣기 그 법정이 우리의 운명을 결정할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The court will decide our fate/fates. 발음

examples.korean: The correctness of this decision may be doubted. 발음듣기 이 결정의 적절성이 의심을 받을 수도 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The correctness of this decision may be doubted. 발음
